summary: Set in the Channel Islands on the eve of D Day,two Kiwi commandos, sent to destroy German gun emplacements to distract Hitler's forces away from Normandy, discover a Nazi occult plot to unleash demonic forces to win the war.
cast: Craig Hall|Matthew Sunderland|Gina Varela|Karlos Drinkwater|Geraldine Brophy|Luke Hawker|Jessica Grace Smith|Jonathan King|Nick Dunbar|Hadyn Green
title: The Devil's Rock
